# name : text partial render controller api rails

# (link "/Users/bartuer/local/src/rails/actionpack/test/controller/render_test.rb" 21684)
# (rdoc "ActionController::Base#render")
# (yas/tap) render, :text 'hey', :status 404, :layout true
# --
render ${1:`(yas/p ":text" "'hey'")`}$0, ${2:`(yas/p ":status" "404")`}, ${3:`(yas/p ":layout" "true")`}
